snippet: Bosh will not play for Miami in its next game, at Atlanta, but the Heat offered no further information about his going back on medication to combat a blood clot.
abstract: Miami Heat officials report Chris Bosh will not play in upcoming game against Atlanta, but team reveals no further information about status of his medical treatment for recurrence of blood clot.
lead_paragraph: Bosh will not play for Miami in its next game, at Atlanta, but the Heat offered no further information about his going back on medication to combat a blood clot.

headline.main: Heat to Travel Without Chris Bosh
